scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run --filter user-application deploy
scripts.deploy:production: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run --filter user-application deploy:production
scripts.deploy:data-service: pnpm run build:data-ops && pnpm run --filter data-service deploy
